Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name: Clear-MD® DENV/ZIKV/CHIKV/JEV/WNV/YFV Multiplex Real-time RT-PCR Detection Kit (FAM/HEX/ROX) (100rxn)
products.overview: This multiplex RT-PCR kit is designed to detect six major mosquito-borne flaviviruses including Dengue virus (DENV), Zika virus (ZIKV), Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV), West Nile virus (WNV), Yellow fever virus (YFV), and Chikungunya virus (CHIKV). It is a dual-tube test format allowing separate reactions for probe mix 1 and probe mix 2 to differentiate targets using specific fluorescent dyes.
features: Primer/probe mix 1 detects DENV, YFV, CHIKV
Primer/probe mix 2 detects JEV, WNV, ZIKV
experimentalData: Amplification plots show fluorescence signals from all 6 targets with dye-specific channels (FAM, HEX/VIC, ROX). Separate plots are displayed for probe mix 1 and probe mix 2, with reporter dyes assigned per target.

Target-reporter dye mapping:
- DENV1,3 3’UTR: FAM
- DENV2,4 5’UTR: HEX, VIC
- YFV 5’UTR: HEX, VIC
- CHIKV Envelope: ROX
- JEV1,3: FAM
- WNV: HEX
- ZIKV: ROX

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name: Clear-MD® DENV/ZIKV/CHIKV/JEV/WNV/YFV RT-nested PCR Kit (40rxn)
products.overview: This RT-nested PCR kit is used to detect major mosquito-borne Flaviviruses using electrophoresis for result confirmation. It is designed for conventional nested-PCR detection, providing high specificity for research or surveillance use.
experimentalData: Gel electrophoresis image shows clear amplification of 10 different samples corresponding to DENV1~4, CHIKV, YFV, JEV1, JEV5, ZIKV, and NTC (negative control). Bands are detected between 100–500bp.

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name:
Clear-MD®
SFTSV Real-time RT-PCR Detection Kit (Probe) (100rxn)
products.overview: This kit is designed to detect Severe Fever with Thrombocytopenia Syndrome Virus (SFTSV) using real-time RT-PCR targeting the M and S genome segments. It provides high specificity with minimal cross-reactivity to other tick-borne or mosquito-borne viruses.
features: Target gene: SFTSV M and S segments
No cross-reactivity with other viruses or background organisms
experimentalData: Amplification curves show detection of both S and M segments with internal control. Cross-reactivity testing with 16 related viruses confirms specificity to SFTSV types (A/B/C) only.

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name:
Clear-MD®
SFTSV M Segment RT-nested PCR Kit (40rxn)
products.overview: This nested RT-PCR kit is optimized for detecting SFTSV by targeting the M segment. It uses a two-step nested amplification protocol and gel electrophoresis to confirm the presence of SFTSV-specific bands.
features: Target gene: SFTSV M and S segments
No cross-reactivity with tick- or mosquito-borne virus backgrounds
experimentalData: Electrophoresis image displays clear separation of SFTSV-positive samples (530 bp) and internal control bands (PTC, 218 bp), enabling reliable result confirmation.

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name:
Clear-MD®
Densovirus PCR Detection Kit (48rxn)
products.overview: This kit is optimized to detect densovirus infection in silkworms (Gryllus bimaculatus) using endpoint PCR. It can be used to confirm viral infection from extracted DNA or RNA samples.
experimentalData: Gel electrophoresis image confirms successful densovirus detection using densovirus-specific primers. Amplification plots support qPCR curve validation.

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name: Clear-MD® Flavivirus Real-time RT-PCR Detection Kit (200rxn)
products.overview: This real-time RT-PCR kit is designed to detect multiple flaviviruses including Zika virus, Dengue virus, West Nile virus, Japanese encephalitis virus, and Yellow fever virus with high sensitivity and specificity.
experimentalData: Amplification and gel electrophoresis plots confirm detection of positive samples with clear PTC bands.

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name: Clear-MD® SFTSV Nested RT-PCR Detection Kit (100rxn)
products.overview: This kit detects SFTSV (Severe Fever with Thrombocytopenia Syndrome Virus) using nested RT-PCR and melting temperature (Tm) analysis to determine infection status with high precision.
experimentalData: Melt curve plots confirm specific amplification for SFTSV-positive samples.

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name: Clear-MD® Tsutsugamushi Real-time PCR Detection Kit (Probe) (96rxn)
products.overview: This real-time PCR kit is designed for the detection of Orientia tsutsugamushi, the causative agent of scrub typhus. It targets the 56 kDa antigen-specific gene to enhance sensitivity and specificity of detection.
experimentalData: Amplification and gel electrophoresis results show distinct bands for Tsutsugamushi (530 bp) and internal control (PTC 250 bp).

products.categoryLabel:
Real-time PCR kit &
Conventional PCR kit
products.name: Clear-MD® SFTSV/Tsutsugamushi Real-time PCR Detection Kit (Probe) (100rxn)
products.overview: This real-time PCR kit detects both Orientia tsutsugamushi and Severe Fever with Thrombocytopenia Syndrome Virus (SFTSV). It targets the 56 kDa antigen-specific gene for O. tsutsugamushi and specific SFTSV genes, enhancing both sensitivity and specificity of detection.
experimentalData: Amplification plots show separate detection of SFTSV, Tsutsugamushi, and internal control signals.
